var rslt = "initialized value"; var message = "another value"; try { //var ga = "${javascript:getAnything()}" + " some extra"; // Use your class instance var ga = "any other string"; rslt = ga; var userName = "test"; // "${parent.name}"; message = userName + " for message div"; } catch (error) { rslt = error.toString() + " from catch"; } rslt;
1. something:${rslt}yy
2. a message:$[message]
